comments.body: Re cancellation: this is correct right? CE2 was different here.
It is correct! Also blocking acquires were *generally* cancelable in CE2 though, but it sometimes depended on how exactly you did the acquisition. In CE3 they're always cancelable.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +20,24 @@
Semaphore does what we call "semantic" blocking, meaning that no actual threads are 
being blocked while waiting to acquire a permit. Blocking acquires are cancelable.

## Shared Resource
